    • Method Detail

      • getCategory

        public java.lang.String getCategory(int id)
        Return the type of Satellite based on its category ID
        Parameters:
        id - is a Satellite category ID that should be between 0 and 53 (inclusive)
        Returns:
        a String describing the type of satellite

      • getID

        public int getID(java.lang.String type)
        Get the ID for a corresponding satellite description based on the n2yo.com categories list
        Parameters:
        type - is a String that must be from the CATEGORIES array/list describing the satellite
        Returns:
        the category ID number

      • SetApiKey

        public void SetApiKey(java.lang.String key)
        set the n2yo.com API key.
        Parameters:
        key - - the key obtained from n2yo.com

      • getWhatsUp

        public void getWhatsUp(float obsLat,
                       float obsLng,
                       float obsAlt,
                       int searchRadius,
                       int categoryId)
        Make the What's Up n2yo.com API call for getting a list of satellites within an area above a location of interest
        Parameters:
        obsLat - observer latitude
        obsLng - observer longitude
        obsAlt - observer altitude (meters)
        searchRadius - an angle on [0 90] degrees, where 0 is directly overhead and 90 is the horizon
        categoryId - the category of satellites to filter on. 0 = all kinds

      • getRadioPasses

        public void getRadioPasses(int satID,
                           float obsLat,
                           float obsLng,
                           float obsAlt,
                           int days,
                           int minElevation)
        Provide radio communication time/location pass information for a given Satellite ID
        Parameters:
        satID - satellite NORAD ID
        obsLat - observer latitude
        obsLng - observer longitude
        obsAlt - observer altitude (meters above sea level)
        days - number of days of prediction (max 10)
        minElevation - The minimum elevation acceptable for the highest altitude point of the pass (degrees)

      • getVisualPasses

        public void getVisualPasses(int satID,
                            float obsLat,
                            float obsLng,
                            float obsAlt,
                            int days,
                            int minVisibility)
        Get time/location info for optically visible passes of a given satellite
        Parameters:
        satID - satellite NORAD ID
        obsLat - observer latitude
        obsLng - observer longitude
        obsAlt - observer altitude (meters above sea level)
        days - number of days of prediction (max 10)
        minVisibility - The minimum number of seconds the satellite should be optically visible during the pass

      • getSatPositions

        public void getSatPositions(int satID,
                            float obsLat,
                            float obsLng,
                            float obsAlt,
                            int seconds)
        Retrieve the future positions of any satellite as footprints (latitude, longitude) to display orbits on maps. Also return the satellite's azimuth and elevation with respect to the observer location. Each element in the response array is one second of calculation. First element is calculated for current UTC time.
        Parameters:
        satID - NORAD ID
        obsLat - observer latitude
        obsLng - observer longitude
        obsAlt - observer altitude (meters above sea level)
        seconds - Number of future positions to return. Each second is a position. Maximum 300 seconds.

      • getTle

        public void getTle(int satID)
        Get the latest two line element set (TLE) for a given satellite
        Parameters:
        satID - satellite NORAD ID
